thread.title: Awesome stay - Review
thread.title_full: Awesome stay - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/West 35th Street, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nicegal1289
title: Awesome stay - Review
text: From the moment we walked into the hotel,I knew i made the right choice choosing this place for our long weekend extravaganza in NYC. The front desk staff was so welcoming and friendly. We were starving when we arrived.Tony at the front desk suggested a restaurant around the corner, and even took the time to call and make us a reservation. What more can i say. It was perfect and so much fun. We will be back soon. I highly recommend this place.
